description: The purpose of the contract is to provide writing and review services for scientific and technical research reports.
duration_in_months: This tender is no longer accepting bids
full_summary:
================================
# Government Tender Announcement

### PROVISION OF SCIENTIFIC TECHNICAL WRITING AND REPORT REVIEW SERVICES
================================(){}
### Solicitation Number: 01B68-22-0057

**Request for Proposal**

### About the Contracting Entity
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for provision of scientific technical writing and report review services. The contract will support the mandate of the Minor Use Pesticide Program of the Pest Management Centre.

### Scope of Work
The selected contractor will provide:

* Compilation, analysis, and summarization of experimental value data into research reports
* Critical review and correction of experimental value data presented in research reports

### Location and Duration
Services will be performed in Canada, with an expected duration until further notice.

### Solicitation Deadline
The solicitation for this proposal closes on **September 21, 2022, at 12:00 PM (EST)**.

### Contract Details
Tender reference number: PW-22-01005834
Tender status: Expired (Expired because the original deadline of August 31, 2022 has passed)

### How to Obtain RFP Documents

You can obtain the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents by visiting the following link:

* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/a043b3368f731f432718c61bedbc3cd6/22-0057_scientific_technical_writing_rfp_eng.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/31/437bbc38364298d75c4615df451b5955/22-0057_scientific_writing_rfp_fr.pdf

### Contact Information
Please contact Rhonda DiMarco at rhonda.dimarco@agr.gc.ca for more information.
